languages.text: ...и прошел сквозь острые образования, не задев ни одного. Едва ли кто-то на борту заметил нечто особенное, однако для Навигатора это событие стало знаковым, даровав особое понимание варп-эманаций.

...and passed the sharp formation without brushing against a single one. No one on board noticed anything in particular, but it became a momentous event for the Navigator, who gained a special understanding of warp emanations.
languages.original_text: ...и прошел сквозь острые образования, не задев ни одного. Едва ли кто-то на борту заметил нечто особенное, однако для Навигатора это событие стало знаковым, даровав особое понимание варп-эманаций.

traits.locale_text: ...and passed the sharp formation by without brushing against a single one. No one on board noticed anything special, but it became a momentous event for Navigator that granted her a special understanding of warp emanations.

...and passed the sharp formation by without brushing against a single one. No one on board noticed anything special, but it became a momentous event for Navigator that granted her a special understanding of warp emanations.

...and passed the sharp formation without brushing against a single one. No one on board noticed anything in particular, but it became a momentous event for the Navigator that granted her a special understanding of warp emanations.

...and passed the sharp formation without brushing against a single one. No one on board noticed anything in particular, but it became a momentous event for the Navigator that granted her a special understanding of warp emanations.

...and passed the sharp formation without brushing against a single one. No one on board noticed anything in particular, but it became a momentous event for the Navigator, who gained a special understanding of warp emanations.

languages.text: ……舰船从尖锐的碎片旁边通过，没有撞上暗礁。船上的人并没有留意到任何特别的情况，但对导航者而言，靠近亚空间暗礁是件非同小可的事情，这也使得导航者对亚空间的力量有了更加深刻的理解。
languages.original_text: ...and passed the sharp formation without brushing against a single one. No one on board noticed anything in particular, but it became a momentous event for the Navigator, who gained a special understanding of warp emanations.

traits.locale_text: ……舰船从尖锐的碎片旁边通过，没有撞上暗礁。船上的人并没有留意到任何特别的情况，但对导航者而言，靠近亚空间暗礁是件非同小可的事情，这也使得导航者对亚空间的力量有了更加深刻的理解。

languages.text: ... y pasó la formación puntiaguda sin rozar a nadie. Nadie a bordo notó nada en particular, pero se convirtió en un acontecimiento trascendental para la Navegante, que obtuvo un conocimiento especial de las emanaciones de la disformidad.
languages.original_text: ...and passed the sharp formation without brushing against a single one. No one on board noticed anything in particular, but it became a momentous event for the Navigator, who gained a special understanding of warp emanations.

traits.locale_text: ... y pasó la formación puntiaguda sin rozar a nadie. Nadie a bordo notó nada en particular, pero se convirtió en un acontecimiento trascendental para la Navegante, que obtuvo un conocimiento especial de las emanaciones de la disformidad.

languages.text: …そして、かすり傷ひとつなく、角が目立つその空間を通過した。船上の他の者には何も特別なことはなかったが、航宙士の彼女にとって、<歪み>の流出への理解を特別深める重大な出来事となった。
languages.original_text: ...and passed the sharp formation without brushing against a single one. No one on board noticed anything in particular, but it became a momentous event for the Navigator, who gained a special understanding of warp emanations.

traits.locale_text: …そして、かすり傷ひとつなく、角が目立つその空間を通過した。船上の他の者には何も特別なことはなかったが、航宙士の彼女にとって、<歪み>の流出への理解を特別深める重大な出来事となった。
…そして、かすり傷ひとつなく、角が目立つその空間を通過した。船上の他の者には何も特別なことはなかったが、航宙士の彼女にとって、<歪み>の流出への理解を特別深める重大な出来事となった。

languages.text: ... et franchit la formation abrupte sans heurt. Aucun membre d'équipage ne remarque quoi que ce soit, mais cet événement déterminant a permis à la navigatrice de récolter de précieuses informations sur les émanations du Warp.
languages.original_text: ...and passed the sharp formation without brushing against a single one. No one on board noticed anything in particular, but it became a momentous event for the Navigator, who gained a special understanding of warp emanations.

traits.locale_text: ... et franchit la formation abrupte sans heurt. Aucun membre d'équipage ne remarque quoi que ce soit, mais cet événement déterminant a permis à la navigatrice de récolter de précieuses informations sur les émanations du Warp.

languages.text: ... und passiert die scharfe Formation, ohne gegen einen einzigen Zacken zu stoßen. Niemand an Bord bemerkt etwas Besonderes, doch für die Navigatorin war die Situation ein wichtiges Ereignis, da es ihr ein besonderes Verständnis für Warp-Ausströmungen gewährte.
languages.original_text: ...and passed the sharp formation without brushing against a single one. No one on board noticed anything in particular, but it became a momentous event for the Navigator, who gained a special understanding of warp emanations.

traits.locale_text: ... und passiert die scharfe Formation, ohne gegen einen einzigen Zacken zu stoßen. Niemand an Bord bemerkt etwas Besonderes, doch für die Navigatorin war die Situation ein wichtiges Ereignis, da es ihr ein besonderes Verständnis für Warp-Ausströmungen gewährte.

... und passiert die scharfe Formation, ohne gegen einen einzigen Zacken zu stoßen. Niemand an Bord bemerkt etwas Besonderes, doch für die Navigatorin war die Situation ein gewaltiges Ereignis, das ihr ein besonderes Verständnis für Warp-Ausströmungen verliehen hat.

languages.text: ...Keskin oluşumların hiçbiriyle temas etmeden resiflerden başarıyla geçti. Gemide kimse farklı bir şey görmese de bu geçiş, Rotacı için önemli bir olay oldu. Öteboyut tezahürlerine dair özel bir anlayış kazandı.
languages.original_text: ...and passed the sharp formation without brushing against a single one. No one on board noticed anything in particular, but it became a momentous event for the Navigator, who gained a special understanding of warp emanations.
